column6:
A hideous spider-creature, a giant turtle, Millie the Model and a road-runner--?! Is Spider-Girl really experiencing all of these bizarre transformations or has she finally lost her ever-loving mind? (Of course, there's always another more sinister possibility...),2005,9


32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | inker:Sal Buscema | writer:Tom DeFalco | penciller (cover):Ron Frenz | colorist:Gotham Entertainment Group | letterer:Dave Sharpe
